Community support for expecting mothers

Connect, learn and share with other moms-to-be

The community feature offers a supportive and informative platform where users can ask questions, share experiences, and provide tips to each other throughout their pregnancy journey.

Did you know?

The community feature includes discussion forums, peer support groups, and a social media-style feed where users can engage with each other, share photos, and post updates.

By offering a community of support, our pregnancy application aims to provide a holistic approach to pregnancy and help expecting mothers feel connected and supported throughout their pregnancy.

A sneak peek of a community feature
